name: Amonous Technologies
tag_list: software-development, web, design, seo, software-testing, ecommerce-solutions
overview:
Amonous Technologies is an emerging comprehensive off shore software provider. Our portfolio comprises of designing, development on microsoft technologies and PHP, eCommerce solutions, blogging interfaces, software testing and SEO services.

Amonous Technologies is an offshore software development company dedicated to stretching the definition of web design and web development by providing comprehensive software solutions with an instinctive and disciplined approach. Amonous is a team of young information technology professionals with a drive to create a niche in the information technology sub-sector by deploying her global IT understanding.

Amonous’s main goal is to keep our clients on the leading edge of information transfer technologies, adding significant value to their business in today’s dynamic digital environment. Most importantly we accomplish this by creating a long-term relationship with each customers by combining creative and cost effective web solutions with a solid foundation of technology based business solutions, support and maintenance to provide value to our customers by offering several benefits to them including speed to market, high quality people and processes, cutting edge technology expertise and a full service portfolio. Explore the world of Synapse for all web site design and web site development technology service needs of clients and to know the opportunities available on the Internet for web promotion their business. We constantly adopt and broaden our range of services to meet the future needs of our customers.
